name: Naisu Kurimu
description:
NAISU KURIIMU is an action game that blends hot gameplay with cool treats. Team up with other players to enter the exciting and chaotic world of “Competitive Scooping”, where frozen specialty chefs, known as Glaciers, from the entire world battle to serve a scoop that will truly reign su-“cream”e.

Current Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to navigate the menu.
  • Enter and Backspace to navigate menu pages.
  • Q to exit the game at any moment.
  • In-game controls are controller-only for now (analog stick for movement, right/left triggers to interact with the tables).
